Abandoning a match or being AFK results in a negative experience for your teammates, and is a punishable offense in League of Legends. Your team has been placed in a low priority queue because the following players

this is sayng me , i abandoned in total two matchs.

replies.body: Even though you didn't intentionally leave, [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats all leaves equally because it still causes others a negative experience.  Bookmark or reach out to your ISP's support site to stay aware of any potential issues during your game time, and be wary of entering a match unless you're sure there won't be any connection issues.  Completing the required games will remove the leaverbuster penalty!  Let me know if that clears things up!
